name: Kellon
description:
Mad about the current events? Stressed? Anxious? Search no more: Kellon is the answer.
Themed after the Lebanese Thawra, Kellon is inspired by the classic Whac-A-Mole arcade game. It offers a fun and addictive way to blow off some steam in these tough times.
Race against the clock in this fast paced, high adrenaline, 'whac-a-pol' game and try to get the best score among your friends.

PS: Don't forget to share!
